issues.economy: At a time when most organisations and businesses have tightened budgets she has increased her claim from the taxpayer by £20,000 (up 13.5% on last year, and now stands at £180,000 a year).
issues.governance: Many local residents have reacted angrily to news that Romsey's Lib Dem MP has claimed the highest expenses of any Hampshire MP for the third year running, according to figures published last month.

images.caption: HAMPSHIRE LIB DEM TOPS EXPENSES LEAGUE

leaflet.additionalNotes: At the time of going to press Mrs Gidley's use of public money is still under investigation by the commissioner appointed to examine MPs' expenses, following a formal complaint by a Romsey resident.
